description: Ensure HTML documents declare a primary language.
recommendation: Add a valid lang (or xml:lang) attribute to the <html> element. (WCAG 2.1 SC 3.1.1)
algorithm: Checks the <html> element for lang or xml:lang attributes and flags missing/empty values.
algorithm_advanced: Checks <html> for lang/xml:lang via DOM or regex and reports missing/empty attributes.
